name: The Monastery (ItsAPudding)
description:
Game made for Commonplace Book , An itch io jam , and make something .

You play as Harold(not really, you can change their name), lost in the woods. Until a spirit(?) appeared and demanded three items to get you out of the woods.

But strangely enough, these woods takes you into weird places. Will you be able to retrieve the items required to leave this terrible place? Will you ever be able to find out what happened here? Weren't you just living in a simple -redacted-

This is a small RTP game that features puzzles and chase. It's labelled horror but not really :/

Game has 2 endings.

Unfortunately due to how unoptimized RPGmaker MV are, I've reached the file limit for HTML :v

-------------------

Main Prompt: 195 Pane of peculiar-looking glass from a ruined monastery reputed to have harboured devil-worship set up in modern house at edge of wild country. Landscape looks vaguely and unplaceably wrong through it. It has some unknown time-distorting quality, and comes from a primal, lost civilisation. Finally, hideous things in other world seen through it.

Side prompt from other jam: Fragmented Memories
